title: Евакуація
overview: Evacuation is a story about a computer science teacher from Poland, Marius, who sets out to search for and rescue his 12-year-old daughter, Maria, from Mariupol, which is occupied by the russian army.The hero meets incredible people who help him look for his daughter, and goes through a very difficult and dangerous path: more than once he finds himself on the verge of life and death, makes his way through the front line under fire, gets captured. The Ukrainian military reality changes the man: from a modest and indecisive teacher, he turns into a true hero of his time.
